snippet: Mexico’s highest election court voted Thursday night to dismiss legal challenges from the second-place leftist candidate seeking to overturn the results of the presidential election.
lead_paragraph: Mexico’s highest election court voted Thursday night to dismiss legal challenges from the second-place leftist candidate seeking to overturn the results of the presidential election.

headline.seo: Andrés Manuel López Obrador’s Election Challenge Is Rejected
headline.main: Mexican Court Rejects Runner-Up’s Election Challenge
headline.print_headline: Mexican Court Rejects Runner-Up’s Election Challenge
